__e: May I say what a pleasure it is to see you here again, sir?
It is not visible, but he are certainly glad that you came.
I don't know what's going on with you, but I better not see you here again.
But you can think of it like a...
Uh, you might want to think of this as a trial run of your own.
And maybe we should just see them as something trying to, like...
Well, my replica wouldn't be as glad to see you as I am.
You got to make this an "us or them"?
To see her for months on end as a pal.
PLEASE, CAN'T YOU SEE IT THAT WAY ?
Yeah, I'm not sure I see it that way.
Hey, if you want to look at it that way, fine.
But there's a few ways to look at it.
I don't know, it's a woman, I can't see her face.
I don't want her to think I don't see her that way anymore, but I also don't want her to think that's all I see either.
She can see you, and we're right here.
- Can I? I don't know where the hell she is. You're the one who saw her, and it's not my problem.
You insisted on seeing her, not me! What d'you want from me now?
Your mom is upstairs hurting, and I can't bear to watch it.
It hurt me to see her like this, okay?
Please, i need to see her again.
Yeah, I know. I just wanted to see her again.
Oh, it is my happy pleasure to see you back in your home where you belong.
She thought if she went there and saw her in person, she might get some answers about her past.
I just need a little face time with her.
And this is why you needed to see her face to face?
Yeah, I know. I just wanted to see her again.
And this is why you needed to see her face to face?
Oh, it is my happy pleasure to see you back in your home where you belong.
